code: import React from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DateDisplay=()=>{const date=new Date();const formattedDate=date.toLocaleDateString('en-US',{year:'numeric',month:'long',day:'numeric'});const formattedTime=date.toLocaleTimeString('en-US',{hour:'2-digit',minute:'2-digit',hour12:false,timeZone:'America/Los_Angeles',timeZoneName:'short'});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'relative',padding:"20px",width:'100%',display:'flex',justifyContent:'right',alignItems:'right',flexDirection:'row',margin:'5px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{style:{color:'orange'},children:[formattedDate,' ',formattedTime]})});};export default DateDisplay;
